shrimp.name: HapkeLunar
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Based on Szymon Rusinkiewicz's implementation of the Hapke-Lommel-Seeliger lunar surface BRDF, with Schonberg backstattering and Hapke retrodirective function. The "density" parameter controls the density of the surface. The "scattering" parameter, controls the forward scattering of the surface, and the "reflectivity" parameter, the surface reflectivity. The diffuse color value is passed to the "aov_surfacecolor", and the diffuse value to the "aov_diffuse" AOV presets.The "category" variable defines the light categories used for the "illuminance" construct of this block.
